body:
Update:

Sorry for not writing or posting 😐

I’ve been getting acclimated with the new job and other stuff. But right now, I’m waiting on a bath of chocolate chip muffins to come out of the oven and fixing myself a cup a tea then it’s on with writing some stories. I’m trying to figure out a nice schedule for my stories but we will see what happens. I work from 9:30-6:00pm on the weekdays but maybe I’ll get more out since it’s a three-day weekend. I don’t celebrate Memorial Day but I will designate that as Write Like Hell Day.

Thanks again!


Maurisa 💋

summary: Daughter💘 Chris Evans Warnings: major fluuuufff Request: can you do an imagine where you and chris’s mom get along so well and...
body:
Daughter💘 Chris Evans

Warnings: major fluuuufff

Request: can you do an imagine where you and chris’s mom get along so well and she’s always telling chris to marry you so she can have you officially as a daughter? fluffyyy please and thank you

A/N: pLeAsE😭 the gIf

Relationship: Chris Evans x black plus sized reader


“Y/N how are you” I smile and hug Catherine Chris’s mother. We just got off the plane and landed here in Boston cause it’s her birthday.


“Hi Mrs. Evans I’m good how about you”


“I’m great it’s so good to see you” she lets me in and his father Daniel jogs to the door with an apron on. He gives me a big hug and I smile.


“How’s my daughter in law” I blush. Me and Chris aren’t married but his parents especially Catherine pressure him to marry me. I told him I don’t mind if we wait.


“I’m great what are you making?”


“Burgers is that ok?”


“Yea”


“Hey guys” Chris walks through with our bags. He hugs his dad and kisses his mom on the cheek.


“Hey son hows things in California”


“They’re great even though traffic makes me want to fight everyone” he chuckles


“Well let’s pray our daughter in law keeps you grounded”


“Of course she does” he pulls me in and kisses me.


“Come on Scott’s in the pool”


“Wanna go for a swim?” He asks


“Yea”


We all migrate to the back where I see Scott swimming around.


“Hey Scott” I wave


“Hey” he smiles. Me and Chris sit on the patio where he puts his hand on my thigh.


His mother just stares at us with a relaxed smile on her face.


“Ugh Chris when are you gonna marry Y/N?” She asks bluntly


“Ma” he says


“I want her as my daughter your playing games I’ll make Scott marry her in a minute”


“He’s gay”


“And?” I laugh


“Plus I want grand babies from you”


“Ma” he groans


“Christopher” She mocks


“Don’t worry Mrs. Evans it might happen in due time” I smile


“It will” he emphasizes “just not right now”


“And I’m ok with that” I smile. He leans down and kisses me.


“Who am I marrying?” Scott asks pushing back his hair. We all laugh at him.

summary: The Cat’s Out of the Bag
title: The Cat’s Out of the Bag
body:
Summary: Chris has a secret that Mark accidentally spills a secret during an interview. 

Pairings: Chris Evans x Reader 

Word Count: 726

Warnings: Like one swear word (sh-t)

Requested: Yes, @rororo06​ | “Can you do a fic where someone on the cast reveals u and chris Evans (who are married) are expecting their first child during the endgame press tour”

A/N: I enjoyed writing this out so much! It was perfect and a quick shoutout to @princess-evans-addict​ for helping me with the plot and who should spill the beans. Thanks girl! Let me know what you think and remember, I love you all :) 

Feedback is welcome and is very much appreciated ♡

Chris ran his hand through his hair, as he tried his best to swallow the yawn that was trying to creep its way into the next interview. While Mark was shifting his way to the empty chair next to Chris. Chris pulled out his phone and typed a quick message to Y/N; just to check up on how she was doing. She had just entered her third trimester, and to say that they were excited would be an understatement. He glanced up at the crew smiling and waiting for a response from Y/N. Once he was done with their unfortunately very short conversation, he slipped his phone into his pocket.

He smiled at Mark as he clapped his shoulder, catching Chris’ attention. “How’s she doing?” The cast has always been in love with Y/N, knowing that she was perfect for Chris.

“She’s doing good, just overall quite excited. She can’t stop sending me pictures of things she bought” Chris smiled turning back to the interviewer as they began recording. The interviewer smiled at the group, beginning to introduce them and start talking about the movie that was on everyone’s mind.

Only Chris had two things on his mind other than the movie; Y/N and their baby. After a short moment, he noticed both Mark and the interviewer were staring at him; realizing that he was asked a question. He shook his head and apologized. “I’m so sorry, what was the question?”

The rest began to laugh, as the interviewer said, “it seems like there’s a lot on your mind.”

The crowd laughed as Mark from beside Chris elbowed him. “Right, that’s what happens when you’re expecting your first child.”  At that moment, Chris’ eyes grew wide while Mark gasped at the fact that he just spilled the beans on something on the air that wasn’t even his secret, to begin with.
“Oh shit!” It was quiet for a whole minute, no one daring to say anything. While the interviewer was also trying to figure out what to say next.

“Well, it looks like the cats out if the bag now,” Chris, awkwardly chuckled, breaking the very deafening silence.

Mark turned to Chris, hand still covering his mouth. “I’m so sorry man.”

Chris took a minute, not knowing what to say only to chuckle. “It’s alright man. The truth was bound to slip.”

The interviewer switched glances between Mark and Chris, chuckling nervously. “Well, I guess congratulations!”

“Thank you!” Chris laughed, finally the interview began asking the standard questions and soon enough it was over. Right, when Chris got the chance, he pulled out his phone again and began texting his wife a brief summary of everything that just took place. ‘We slightly have a problem.’

Y/N didn’t take to long to respond. ‘What’s wrong?’

‘The cat’s out of the bag,’

It was only a minute after he pressed send, that a picture of Y/N from their wedding day popped up on his screen; notifying him that she was calling.

“What cat? I’m so confused,” her laugh filled the other end of the call and the speaker.

“Y/N, the cat being you’re pregnant is out of the bag, Mark slipped it out during an interview.“

Y/N was silent for a few seconds but soon filled that silence by saying, “it’s alright, we’ll make a post saying our part and how excited we are. Nothing has changed, really.

“I know, it’s just,” Chris sighed deeply, "we were excited to be the ones to share the news,”

“I know, baby, but it happened and I’m sure Mark didn’t intentionally mean to ruin it for us. We just have to move forward and remember everything happens for a reason. Maybe this way it would be easier to just post something simple and not have everyone expecting some grand reveal.”

Chris nodded along to Y/N’s words, he could see her point and knew that the damage was already done and there wasn’t much they could do about it now.  

"Thank Mark for me, yeah?” Y/N’s voice pulled Chris from his deep thoughts.  He replied with a chuckle, feeling better than before as he bid farewell to Y/N and made his way to Mark. He could still see the look of regret on Mark’s face so he simply, clapped his back and assured him that everything was okay; just like Y/N said.
